title: Config Keybind changes with new client
body:
Whenever I've made a new account I've always copy-pasted my config and persistent settings files over between accounts while in a custom game to change all my keybinds at once. 

I've noticed on the new client this doesn't seem to work and I need a work around, mostly because I used left click as AttackMoveClick which you cant set within the game or client themselves as it it doesn't recognise MB1 as an actual useable bind. 

Or is there a way to implement a "Client Specific Binds" option where I can play all my accounts with the same keybinds since they are never used on anything by my PC.

replies.body:
The bindings that you're using are intended for reserved keys, so it's definitely possible to run into issues like this.  We don't support these kinds of modification, so I wouldn't know how to help fix this up aside from resetting your config to default.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

From there you can rebind your keys, though I wouldn't recommend making unintended modifications as it's possible to run into these issues again.
Thanks, sorry for the late reply but I figured it out too before seeing this post. I've been using these weird binds for years and never encountered an issue but I'll always bare it in mind.
